basics.name: Maulik Asit Kothari
basics.label: Programmer. Startup Enthusiast. Foodie.
basics.summary: I am a Master's in Computer Science student at Indiana University, Bloomington. I dabble in Javascript and Python.

work.summary: Zinc is a startup backed by YCombinator, enabling the next generation of ecommerce with their standardized API for ordering from retailers.
highlights: Developed an API which places live orders on amazon.com,amazon.uk and ssense.com

Built a file exchange parser which reads emails, parses and stores the attachments into a database, places live orders on Amazon, stores the response into the database objects, generates excel documents from the database and emails them to the customers.
Worked on various modules of priceyak.com and joelister.com.
Generated revenue tracking scripts focusing on WoW growth.
Analyzed the working of various stages of software development in Information Technology industry including product development, product testing and system integration.
Worked as a part of requirement gathering and application development team.
Created dynamic web pages that use HTML forms to get end-user input using Java servlets.
Designed a program to read data from a file using servlets and convert the data into a form required by the next phase of program.

publications.name: Comcrypt : An Encryption Algorithm Based on Vernam Cipher

publications.name: Open Graph Infrastructure for Uniform Access To e-learning on Cloud.
